items.question: What kind of event was [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

items.question: What were the locations that hosted [Event]?
What role did television and media coverage play in [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Broadcasts ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?broadcast .
    ?broadcast schema:citation ?url .
    ?broadcast schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

items.question: How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?
items.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription

items.question: Why is [MusicGroup]’s performance at [Event] considered iconic?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName ?reason ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({musicgroup} as ?artist)
    BIND ({event} as ?event)
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf   ?event ;
                 schema:performer   ?artist .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
    ?review schema:itemReviewed ?performance .
    ?review schema:reviewBody ?reason .
    ?review schema:url ?url .
}

items.question: Which organization failed to archive the broadcast of [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?eventName ?subBroadcastDescription ?broadcastCompanyName ?preserved
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} as ?mainEvent)
    ?mainEvent schema:name ?eventName .
    ?mainEvent ex:hadBroadcast ?mainBroadcast .
    ?mainBroadcast schema:subEvent ?subBroadcast .
    ?subBroadcast schema:description ?subBroadcastDescription .
    ?subBroadcast schema:provider ?broadcastCompany .
    ?subBroadcast ex:wasBroadcastPreserved ?preserved .
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany schema:name ?broadcastCompanyName }
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany rdfs:label ?broadcastCompanyName }
    FILTER(?preserved = false)
}
ORDER BY DESC(?preserved)

items.question: How many viewers watched [Event] globally?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?eventName ?audienceType ?viewerCount ?countryCount
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} as ?event)
    ?event ex:hadBroadcast ?broadcast .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast schema:audience ?audience .
    ?audience schema:audienceType ?audienceType .
    ?audience ex:countryCount ?countryCount .
    ?audience ex:viewerCount ?viewerCount .
}

items.question: Who were the members of [MusicGroup]?
When was [MusicGroup] formed?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT ?artistName ?foundingDate ?foundingLocation
WHERE {
    BIND ({musicgroup} as ?artist)
    ?artist a mm:MusicArtist .
    ?artist schema:foundingDate ?foundingDate .
    ?artist schema:foundingLocation ?foundingLocation .
    ?artist schema:name ?artistName .
}

items.question: What facilitated the simultaneous global broadcast of [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Satellite ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?satellite .
    ?satellite schema:citation ?url .
    ?satellite schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

items.question: Which organization archived the broadcast of [Event]?
What is the preservation status of [Event] broadcasts at [Venue]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?eventName ?subBroadcastDescription ?broadcastCompanyName ?preserved
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} as ?mainEvent)
    ?mainEvent ex:hadBroadcast ?mainBroadcast .
    ?mainEvent schema:name ?eventName .
    ?mainBroadcast schema:subEvent ?subBroadcast .
    ?subBroadcast schema:description ?subBroadcastDescription .
    ?subBroadcast schema:provider ?broadcastCompany .
    ?subBroadcast ex:wasBroadcastPreserved ?preserved .
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany schema:name ?broadcastCompanyName }
    OPTIONAL { ?broadcastCompany rdfs:label ?broadcastCompanyName }
}
ORDER BY DESC(?preserved)
